++ DNS


  * DNS performs the basic function of locating Internet servers. The software you use on the Internet performs DNS lookups automatically, sometimes dozens per web page.

  * (1) To this day, twenty years later, many web sites and applications still do not employ secure DNS or perform any authentication at all during DNS lookups.
